verses.verse: And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn <S%H4729><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> upon <S%H7848><s%>: of acacia wood <S%H6086><s%> shalt thou make it <S%H6213><s%>.

A cubit <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H7251><s%>; foursquare shall it be <S%H520><s%>; and two cubits shall be the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof <S%H7161><s%>: the horns thereof shall be of one piece with it.

And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, the top <S%H1406><s%> thereof <S%H7023><s%>, and the sides thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof <S%H6213><s%>; and thou shalt make unto it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> for it under the crown <S%H2213><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>; upon the two ribs <S%H6763><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>, upon the two sides <S%H6654><s%> of it shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H1004><s%>; and they shall be for places for staves <S%H905><s%> wherewith <S%H1992><s%> to bear it <S%H5375><s%>.
And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> that is by the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> that is over the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, where I will meet with thee <S%H3259><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> thereon incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices <S%H1242><s%>: every morning, when he dresseth <S%H3190><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%>, he shall burn it <S%H6999><s%>.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> lighteth <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, he shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it <S%H8548><s%>, a perpetual incense <S%H6999><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Ye shall offer <S%H5927><s%> no strange <S%H2114><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon <S%H4503><s%>, nor burnt-offering, nor meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>; and ye shall pour <S%H5258><s%> no drink-offering <S%H5262><s%> thereon.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it once <S%H259><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%>; with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%> once <S%H259><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> shall he make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for it throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

When thou takest <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, according to those that are numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H5414><s%>, then shall they give every man <S%H376><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%> for his soul <S%H5315><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when thou numberest <S%H6485><s%> them <S%H5063><s%>; that there be no plague among them <S%H6485><s%>, when thou numberest them.

This they shall give <S%H5414><s%>, every one that passeth <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> unto them that are numbered <S%H6485><s%>: half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> (the shekel <S%H8255><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>), half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel <S%H8255><s%> for an offering <S%H8641><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Every one that passeth <S%H5674><s%> over unto them that are numbered <S%H6485><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H5414><s%>, shall give the offering <S%H8641><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

The rich <S%H6223><s%> shall not give more <S%H7235><s%>, and the poor <S%H1800><s%> shall not give less <S%H4591><s%>, than the half <S%H4276><s%> shekel <S%H8255><s%>, when they give <S%H5414><s%> the offering <S%H8641><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your souls <S%H5315><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> the atonement <S%H3725><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and shalt appoint <S%H5414><s%> it for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>; that it may be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your souls <S%H5315><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thou shalt also make <S%H6213><s%> a laver <S%H3595><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, and the base <S%H3653><s%> thereof of brass <S%H5178><s%>, whereat to wash <S%H7364><s%>. And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> it between the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> water therein <S%H4325><s%>.
And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall wash <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet thereat <S%H7272><s%>:

when they go <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>, that they die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H5066><s%>; or when they come near to the altar <S%H4196><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%>, to burn an offering <S%H6999><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

So they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%>, that they die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H2706><s%>: and it shall be a statute for ever <S%H5769><s%> to them <S%H2233><s%>, even to him and to his seed throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Moreover Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> thou also unto thee the chief <S%H7218><s%> spices <S%H1314><s%>: of flowing <S%H1865><s%> myrrh <S%H4753><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H1314><s%>, and of sweet cinnamon <S%H7076><s%> half <S%H4276><s%> so much <S%H4276><s%>, even two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>, and of sweet <S%H1314><s%> calamus <S%H7070><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>,
and of cassia <S%H6916><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and of olive <S%H2132><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> a hin <S%H1969><s%>;

and thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> it a holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, a perfume <S%H7545><s%> compounded <S%H4842><s%> after the art <S%H4639><s%> of the perfumer <S%H7543><s%>: it shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.
And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> therewith the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>,
and the table <S%H7979><s%> and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H4501><s%>, and the candlestick and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H4196><s%>, and the altar of incense <S%H7004><s%>,
and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> with all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H3595><s%>, and the laver and the base thereof <S%H3653><s%>.
And thou shalt sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H6944><s%>, that they may be most holy <S%H6944><s%>: whatsoever toucheth <S%H5060><s%> them shall be holy <S%H6942><s%>.
And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H3547><s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office.

And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> unto me throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Upon the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shall it not be poured <S%H3251><s%>, neither shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> any like it <S%H4971><s%>, according to the composition thereof <S%H6944><s%>: it is holy, and it shall be holy unto you <S%H6944><s%>.

Whosoever <S%H834><s%> compoundeth <S%H7543><s%> any like it <S%H5414><s%>, or whosoever putteth any of it upon a stranger <S%H2114><s%>, he shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> unto thee sweet spices <S%H5561><s%>, stacte <S%H5198><s%>, and onycha <S%H7827><s%>, and galbanum <S%H2464><s%>; sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices <S%H5561><s%> with pure <S%H2134><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%>: of each <S%H905><s%> shall there be a like weight <S%H905><s%>;

and thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> of it incense <S%H7004><s%>, a perfume <S%H7004><s%> after the art <S%H4639><s%> of the perfumer <S%H7543><s%>, seasoned <S%H4414><s%> with salt <S%H2889><s%>, pure and holy <S%H6944><s%>:

and thou shalt beat <S%H7833><s%> some of it very small <S%H1854><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> of it before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, where I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with thee <S%H6944><s%>: it shall be unto you most holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And the incense <S%H7004><s%> which thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%>, according to the composition <S%H4971><s%> thereof ye shall not make <S%H6213><s%> for yourselves <S%H6944><s%>: it shall be unto thee holy for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Whosoever <S%H834><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> like unto that <S%H7306><s%>, to smell thereof <S%H3772><s%>, he shall be cut off from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
